01628 
01629 /*
01630  * initialize per-thread page pool (bug 5137).
01631  */
01632 int tgt_io_thread_init(struct ptlrpc_thread *thread)
01633 {
01634         struct tgt_thread_big_cache *tbc;
01635 
01636         ENTRY;
01637 
01638         LASSERT(thread != NULL);
01639         LASSERT(thread->t_data == NULL);
01640 
01641         OBD_ALLOC_LARGE(tbc, sizeof(*tbc));
01642         if (tbc == NULL)
01643                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
01644         thread->t_data = tbc;
01645         RETURN(0);
01646 }
01647 EXPORT_SYMBOL(tgt_io_thread_init);
01648 
01649 /*
01650  * free per-thread pool created by tgt_thread_init().
01651  */
01652 void tgt_io_thread_done(struct ptlrpc_thread *thread)
01653 {
01654         struct tgt_thread_big_cache *tbc;
01655 
01656         ENTRY;
01657 
01658         LASSERT(thread != NULL);
01659 
01660         /*
01661          * be prepared to handle partially-initialized pools (because this is
01662          * called from ost_io_thread_init() for cleanup.
01663          */
01664         tbc = thread->t_data;
01665         if (tbc != NULL) {
01666                 OBD_FREE_LARGE(tbc, sizeof(*tbc));
01667                 thread->t_data = NULL;
01668         }
01669         EXIT;
01670 }
01671 EXPORT_SYMBOL(tgt_io_thread_done);
01676 int tgt_extent_lock(struct ldlm_namespace *ns, struct ldlm_res_id *res_id,
01677                     __u64 start, __u64 end, struct lustre_handle *lh,
01678                     int mode, __u64 *flags)
01679 {
01680         union ldlm_policy_data policy;
01681         int rc;
01682 
01683         ENTRY;
01684 
01685         LASSERT(lh != NULL);
01686         LASSERT(ns != NULL);
01687         LASSERT(!lustre_handle_is_used(lh));
01688 
01689         policy.l_extent.gid = 0;
01690         policy.l_extent.start = start & PAGE_MASK;
01691 
01692         /*
01693          * If ->o_blocks is EOF it means "lock till the end of the file".
01694          * Otherwise, it's size of an extent or hole being punched (in bytes).
01695          */
01696         if (end == OBD_OBJECT_EOF || end < start)
01697                 policy.l_extent.end = OBD_OBJECT_EOF;
01698         else
01699                 policy.l_extent.end = end | ~PAGE_MASK;
01700 
01701         rc = ldlm_cli_enqueue_local(ns, res_id, LDLM_EXTENT, &policy, mode,
01702                                     flags, ldlm_blocking_ast,
01703                                     ldlm_completion_ast, ldlm_glimpse_ast,
01704                                     NULL, 0, LVB_T_NONE, NULL, lh);
01705         RETURN(rc == ELDLM_OK ? 0 : -EIO);
01706 }
01707 EXPORT_SYMBOL(tgt_extent_lock);
01708 
01709 void tgt_extent_unlock(struct lustre_handle *lh, enum ldlm_mode mode)
01710 {
01711         LASSERT(lustre_handle_is_used(lh));
01712         ldlm_lock_decref(lh, mode);
01713 }
01714 EXPORT_SYMBOL(tgt_extent_unlock);
01715 
01716 int tgt_brw_lock(struct ldlm_namespace *ns, struct ldlm_res_id *res_id,
01717                  struct obd_ioobj *obj, struct niobuf_remote *nb,
01718                  struct lustre_handle *lh, enum ldlm_mode mode)
01719 {
01720         __u64                    flags = 0;
01721         int                      nrbufs = obj->ioo_bufcnt;
01722         int                      i;
01723 
01724         ENTRY;
01725 
01726         LASSERT(mode == LCK_PR || mode == LCK_PW);
01727         LASSERT(!lustre_handle_is_used(lh));
01728 
01729         if (nrbufs == 0 || !(nb[0].rnb_flags & OBD_BRW_SRVLOCK))
01730                 RETURN(0);
01731 
01732         for (i = 1; i < nrbufs; i++)
01733                 if (!(nb[i].rnb_flags & OBD_BRW_SRVLOCK))
01734                         RETURN(-EFAULT);
01735 
01736         RETURN(tgt_extent_lock(ns, res_id, nb[0].rnb_offset,
01737                                nb[nrbufs - 1].rnb_offset +
01738                                nb[nrbufs - 1].rnb_len - 1,
01739                                lh, mode, &flags));
01740 }
01741 
01742 void tgt_brw_unlock(struct obd_ioobj *obj, struct niobuf_remote *niob,
01743                     struct lustre_handle *lh, enum ldlm_mode mode)
01744 {
01745         ENTRY;
01746 
01747         LASSERT(mode == LCK_PR || mode == LCK_PW);
01748         LASSERT((obj->ioo_bufcnt > 0 &&
01749                  (niob[0].rnb_flags & OBD_BRW_SRVLOCK)) ==
01750                 lustre_handle_is_used(lh));
01751 
01752         if (lustre_handle_is_used(lh))
01753                 tgt_extent_unlock(lh, mode);
01754         EXIT;
01755 }
01756 
01757 static __u32 tgt_checksum_bulk(struct lu_target *tgt,
01758                                struct ptlrpc_bulk_desc *desc, int opc,
01759                                cksum_type_t cksum_type)
01760 {
01761         struct cfs_crypto_hash_desc     *hdesc;
01762         unsigned int                    bufsize;
01763         int                             i, err;
01764         unsigned char                   cfs_alg = cksum_obd2cfs(cksum_type);
01765         __u32                           cksum;
01766 
01767         LASSERT(ptlrpc_is_bulk_desc_kiov(desc->bd_type));
01768 
01769         hdesc = cfs_crypto_hash_init(cfs_alg, NULL, 0);
01770         if (IS_ERR(hdesc)) {
01771                 CERROR("%s: unable to initialize checksum hash %s\n",
01772                        tgt_name(tgt), cfs_crypto_hash_name(cfs_alg));
01773                 return PTR_ERR(hdesc);
01774         }
01775 
01776         CDEBUG(D_INFO, "Checksum for algo %s\n", cfs_crypto_hash_name(cfs_alg));
01777         for (i = 0; i < desc->bd_iov_count; i++) {
01778                 /* corrupt the data before we compute the checksum, to
01779                  * simulate a client->OST data error */
01780                 if (i == 0 && opc == OST_WRITE &&
01781                     OBD_FAIL_CHECK(OBD_FAIL_OST_CHECKSUM_RECEIVE)) {
01782                         int off = BD_GET_KIOV(desc, i).kiov_offset &
01783                                 ~PAGE_MASK;
01784                         int len = BD_GET_KIOV(desc, i).kiov_len;
01785                         struct page *np = tgt_page_to_corrupt;
01786                         char *ptr = kmap(BD_GET_KIOV(desc, i).kiov_page) + off;
01787 
01788                         if (np) {
01789                                 char *ptr2 = kmap(np) + off;
01790 
01791                                 memcpy(ptr2, ptr, len);
01792                                 memcpy(ptr2, "bad3", min(4, len));
01793                                 kunmap(np);
01794                                 BD_GET_KIOV(desc, i).kiov_page = np;
01795                         } else {
01796                                 CERROR("%s: can't alloc page for corruption\n",
01797                                        tgt_name(tgt));
01798                         }
01799                 }
01800                 cfs_crypto_hash_update_page(hdesc,
01801                                   BD_GET_KIOV(desc, i).kiov_page,
01802                                   BD_GET_KIOV(desc, i).kiov_offset &
01803                                         ~PAGE_MASK,
01804                                   BD_GET_KIOV(desc, i).kiov_len);
01805 
01806                  /* corrupt the data after we compute the checksum, to
01807                  * simulate an OST->client data error */
01808                 if (i == 0 && opc == OST_READ &&
01809                     OBD_FAIL_CHECK(OBD_FAIL_OST_CHECKSUM_SEND)) {
01810                         int off = BD_GET_KIOV(desc, i).kiov_offset
01811                           & ~PAGE_MASK;
01812                         int len = BD_GET_KIOV(desc, i).kiov_len;
01813                         struct page *np = tgt_page_to_corrupt;
01814                         char *ptr =
01815                           kmap(BD_GET_KIOV(desc, i).kiov_page) + off;
01816 
01817                         if (np) {
01818                                 char *ptr2 = kmap(np) + off;
01819 
01820                                 memcpy(ptr2, ptr, len);
01821                                 memcpy(ptr2, "bad4", min(4, len));
01822                                 kunmap(np);
01823                                 BD_GET_KIOV(desc, i).kiov_page = np;
01824                         } else {
01825                                 CERROR("%s: can't alloc page for corruption\n",
01826                                        tgt_name(tgt));
01827                         }
01828                 }
01829         }
01830 
01831         bufsize = sizeof(cksum);
01832         err = cfs_crypto_hash_final(hdesc, (unsigned char *)&cksum, &bufsize);
01833 
01834         return cksum;
01835 }
01836 
01837 int tgt_brw_read(struct tgt_session_info *tsi)
01838 {
01839         struct ptlrpc_request   *req = tgt_ses_req(tsi);
01840         struct ptlrpc_bulk_desc *desc = NULL;
01841         struct obd_export       *exp = tsi->tsi_exp;
01842         struct niobuf_remote    *remote_nb;
01843         struct niobuf_local     *local_nb;
01844         struct obd_ioobj        *ioo;
01845         struct ost_body         *body, *repbody;
01846         struct l_wait_info       lwi;
01847         struct lustre_handle     lockh = { 0 };
01848         int                      npages, nob = 0, rc, i, no_reply = 0;
01849         struct tgt_thread_big_cache *tbc = req->rq_svc_thread->t_data;
01850 
01851         ENTRY;
01852 
01853         if (ptlrpc_req2svc(req)->srv_req_portal != OST_IO_PORTAL) {
01854                 CERROR("%s: deny read request from %s to portal %u\n",
01855                        tgt_name(tsi->tsi_tgt),
01856                        obd_export_nid2str(req->rq_export),
01857                        ptlrpc_req2svc(req)->srv_req_portal);
01858                 RETURN(-EPROTO);
01859         }
01860 
01861         req->rq_bulk_read = 1;
01862 
01863         if (OBD_FAIL_CHECK(OBD_FAIL_OST_BRW_READ_BULK))
01864                 RETURN(-EIO);
01865 
01866         OBD_FAIL_TIMEOUT(OBD_FAIL_OST_BRW_PAUSE_BULK, cfs_fail_val > 0 ?
01867                          cfs_fail_val : (obd_timeout + 1) / 4);
01868 
01869         /* Check if there is eviction in progress, and if so, wait for it to
01870          * finish */
01871         if (unlikely(atomic_read(&exp->exp_obd->obd_evict_inprogress))) {
01872                 /* We do not care how long it takes */
01873                 lwi = LWI_INTR(NULL, NULL);
01874                 rc = l_wait_event(exp->exp_obd->obd_evict_inprogress_waitq,
01875                          !atomic_read(&exp->exp_obd->obd_evict_inprogress),
01876                          &lwi);
01877         }
01878 
01879         /* There must be big cache in current thread to process this request
01880          * if it is NULL then something went wrong and it wasn't allocated,
01881          * report -ENOMEM in that case */
01882         if (tbc == NULL)
01883                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
01884 
01885         body = tsi->tsi_ost_body;
01886         LASSERT(body != NULL);
01887 
01888         ioo = req_capsule_client_get(tsi->tsi_pill, &RMF_OBD_IOOBJ);
01889         LASSERT(ioo != NULL); /* must exists after tgt_ost_body_unpack */
01890 
01891         remote_nb = req_capsule_client_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_NIOBUF_REMOTE);
01892         LASSERT(remote_nb != NULL); /* must exists after tgt_ost_body_unpack */
01893 
01894         local_nb = tbc->local;
01895 
01896         rc = tgt_brw_lock(exp->exp_obd->obd_namespace, &tsi->tsi_resid, ioo,
01897                           remote_nb, &lockh, LCK_PR);
01898         if (rc != 0)
01899                 RETURN(rc);
01900 
01901         /*
01902          * If getting the lock took more time than
01903          * client was willing to wait, drop it. b=11330
01904          */
01905         if (cfs_time_current_sec() > req->rq_deadline ||
01906             OBD_FAIL_CHECK(OBD_FAIL_OST_DROP_REQ)) {
01907                 no_reply = 1;
01908                 CERROR("Dropping timed-out read from %s because locking"
01909                        "object "DOSTID" took %ld seconds (limit was %ld).\n",
01910                        libcfs_id2str(req->rq_peer), POSTID(&ioo->ioo_oid),
01911                        cfs_time_current_sec() - req->rq_arrival_time.tv_sec,
01912                        req->rq_deadline - req->rq_arrival_time.tv_sec);
01913                 GOTO(out_lock, rc = -ETIMEDOUT);
01914         }
01915 
01916         repbody = req_capsule_server_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_OST_BODY);
01917         repbody->oa = body->oa;
01918 
01919         npages = PTLRPC_MAX_BRW_PAGES;
01920         rc = obd_preprw(tsi->tsi_env, OBD_BRW_READ, exp, &repbody->oa, 1,
01921                         ioo, remote_nb, &npages, local_nb);
01922         if (rc != 0)
01923                 GOTO(out_lock, rc);
01924 
01925         desc = ptlrpc_prep_bulk_exp(req, npages, ioobj_max_brw_get(ioo),
01926                                     PTLRPC_BULK_PUT_SOURCE |
01927                                         PTLRPC_BULK_BUF_KIOV,
01928                                     OST_BULK_PORTAL,
01929                                     &ptlrpc_bulk_kiov_nopin_ops);
01930         if (desc == NULL)
01931                 GOTO(out_commitrw, rc = -ENOMEM);
01932 
01933         nob = 0;
01934         for (i = 0; i < npages; i++) {
01935                 int page_rc = local_nb[i].lnb_rc;
01936 
01937                 if (page_rc < 0) {
01938                         rc = page_rc;
01939                         break;
01940                 }
01941 
01942                 nob += page_rc;
01943                 if (page_rc != 0) { /* some data! */
01944                         LASSERT(local_nb[i].lnb_page != NULL);
01945                         desc->bd_frag_ops->add_kiov_frag
01946                           (desc, local_nb[i].lnb_page,
01947                            local_nb[i].lnb_page_offset,
01948                            page_rc);
01949                 }
01950 
01951                 if (page_rc != local_nb[i].lnb_len) { /* short read */
01952                         /* All subsequent pages should be 0 */
01953                         while (++i < npages)
01954                                 LASSERT(local_nb[i].lnb_rc == 0);
01955                         break;
01956                 }
01957         }
01958         if (OBD_FAIL_CHECK(OBD_FAIL_OST_READ_SIZE) &&
01959             nob != cfs_fail_val)
01960                 rc = -E2BIG;
01961 
01962         if (body->oa.o_valid & OBD_MD_FLCKSUM) {
01963                 cksum_type_t cksum_type =
01964                         cksum_type_unpack(body->oa.o_valid & OBD_MD_FLFLAGS ?
01965                                           body->oa.o_flags : 0);
01966                 repbody->oa.o_flags = cksum_type_pack(cksum_type);
01967                 repbody->oa.o_valid = OBD_MD_FLCKSUM | OBD_MD_FLFLAGS;
01968                 repbody->oa.o_cksum = tgt_checksum_bulk(tsi->tsi_tgt, desc,
01969                                                         OST_READ, cksum_type);
01970                 CDEBUG(D_PAGE, "checksum at read origin: %x\n",
01971                        repbody->oa.o_cksum);
01972         } else {
01973                 repbody->oa.o_valid = 0;
01974         }
01975         /* We're finishing using body->oa as an input variable */
01976 
01977         /* Check if client was evicted while we were doing i/o before touching
01978          * network */
01979         if (likely(rc == 0 &&
01980                    !CFS_FAIL_PRECHECK(OBD_FAIL_PTLRPC_CLIENT_BULK_CB2))) {
01981                 rc = target_bulk_io(exp, desc, &lwi);
01982                 no_reply = rc != 0;
01983         }
01984 
01985 out_commitrw:
01986         /* Must commit after prep above in all cases */
01987         rc = obd_commitrw(tsi->tsi_env, OBD_BRW_READ, exp, &repbody->oa, 1, ioo,
01988                           remote_nb, npages, local_nb, rc);
01989         if (rc == 0)
01990                 tgt_drop_id(exp, &repbody->oa);
01991 out_lock:
01992         tgt_brw_unlock(ioo, remote_nb, &lockh, LCK_PR);
01993 
01994         if (desc && !CFS_FAIL_PRECHECK(OBD_FAIL_PTLRPC_CLIENT_BULK_CB2))
01995                 ptlrpc_free_bulk(desc);
01996 
01997         LASSERT(rc <= 0);
01998         if (rc == 0) {
01999                 rc = nob;
02000                 ptlrpc_lprocfs_brw(req, nob);
02001         } else if (no_reply) {
02002                 req->rq_no_reply = 1;
02003                 /* reply out callback would free */
02004                 ptlrpc_req_drop_rs(req);
02005                 LCONSOLE_WARN("%s: Bulk IO read error with %s (at %s), "
02006                               "client will retry: rc %d\n",
02007                               exp->exp_obd->obd_name,
02008                               obd_uuid2str(&exp->exp_client_uuid),
02009                               obd_export_nid2str(exp), rc);
02010         }
02011         /* send a bulk after reply to simulate a network delay or reordering
02012          * by a router */
02013         if (unlikely(CFS_FAIL_PRECHECK(OBD_FAIL_PTLRPC_CLIENT_BULK_CB2))) {
02014                 wait_queue_head_t        waitq;
02015                 struct l_wait_info       lwi1;
02016 
02017                 CDEBUG(D_INFO, "reorder BULK\n");
02018                 init_waitqueue_head(&waitq);
02019 
02020                 lwi1 = LWI_TIMEOUT_INTR(cfs_time_seconds(3), NULL, NULL, NULL);
02021                 l_wait_event(waitq, 0, &lwi1);
02022                 target_bulk_io(exp, desc, &lwi);
02023                 ptlrpc_free_bulk(desc);
02024         }
02025 
02026         RETURN(rc);
02027 }
02028 EXPORT_SYMBOL(tgt_brw_read);
02029 
02030 static void tgt_warn_on_cksum(struct ptlrpc_request *req,
02031                               struct ptlrpc_bulk_desc *desc,
02032                               struct niobuf_local *local_nb, int npages,
02033                               u32 client_cksum, u32 server_cksum,
02034                               bool mmap)
02035 {
02036         struct obd_export *exp = req->rq_export;
02037         struct ost_body *body;
02038         char *router = "";
02039         char *via = "";
02040 
02041         body = req_capsule_client_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_OST_BODY);
02042         LASSERT(body != NULL);
02043 
02044         if (req->rq_peer.nid != desc->bd_sender) {
02045                 via = " via ";
02046                 router = libcfs_nid2str(desc->bd_sender);
02047         }
02048 
02049         if (mmap) {
02050                 CDEBUG_LIMIT(D_INFO, "client csum %x, server csum %x\n",
02051                              client_cksum, server_cksum);
02052                 return;
02053         }
02054 
02055         LCONSOLE_ERROR_MSG(0x168, "BAD WRITE CHECKSUM: %s from %s%s%s inode "
02056                            DFID" object "DOSTID" extent ["LPU64"-"LPU64
02057                            "]: client csum %x, server csum %x\n",
02058                            exp->exp_obd->obd_name, libcfs_id2str(req->rq_peer),
02059                            via, router,
02060                            body->oa.o_valid & OBD_MD_FLFID ?
02061                            body->oa.o_parent_seq : (__u64)0,
02062                            body->oa.o_valid & OBD_MD_FLFID ?
02063                            body->oa.o_parent_oid : 0,
02064                            body->oa.o_valid & OBD_MD_FLFID ?
02065                            body->oa.o_parent_ver : 0,
02066                            POSTID(&body->oa.o_oi),
02067                            local_nb[0].lnb_file_offset,
02068                            local_nb[npages-1].lnb_file_offset +
02069                            local_nb[npages - 1].lnb_len - 1,
02070                            client_cksum, server_cksum);
02071 }
02072 
02073 int tgt_brw_write(struct tgt_session_info *tsi)
02074 {
02075         struct ptlrpc_request   *req = tgt_ses_req(tsi);
02076         struct ptlrpc_bulk_desc *desc = NULL;
02077         struct obd_export       *exp = req->rq_export;
02078         struct niobuf_remote    *remote_nb;
02079         struct niobuf_local     *local_nb;
02080         struct obd_ioobj        *ioo;
02081         struct ost_body         *body, *repbody;
02082         struct l_wait_info       lwi;
02083         struct lustre_handle     lockh = {0};
02084         __u32                   *rcs;
02085         int                      objcount, niocount, npages;
02086         int                      rc, i, j;
02087         cksum_type_t             cksum_type = OBD_CKSUM_CRC32;
02088         bool                     no_reply = false, mmap;
02089         struct tgt_thread_big_cache *tbc = req->rq_svc_thread->t_data;
02090 
02091         ENTRY;
02092 
02093         if (ptlrpc_req2svc(req)->srv_req_portal != OST_IO_PORTAL) {
02094                 CERROR("%s: deny write request from %s to portal %u\n",
02095                        tgt_name(tsi->tsi_tgt),
02096                        obd_export_nid2str(req->rq_export),
02097                        ptlrpc_req2svc(req)->srv_req_portal);
02098                 RETURN(err_serious(-EPROTO));
02099         }
02100 
02101         if (OBD_FAIL_CHECK(OBD_FAIL_OST_ENOSPC))
02102                 RETURN(err_serious(-ENOSPC));
02103         if (OBD_FAIL_TIMEOUT(OBD_FAIL_OST_EROFS, 1))
02104                 RETURN(err_serious(-EROFS));
02105 
02106         req->rq_bulk_write = 1;
02107 
02108         if (OBD_FAIL_CHECK(OBD_FAIL_OST_BRW_WRITE_BULK))
02109                 RETURN(err_serious(-EIO));
02110         if (OBD_FAIL_CHECK(OBD_FAIL_OST_BRW_WRITE_BULK2))
02111                 RETURN(err_serious(-EFAULT));
02112 
02113         /* pause before transaction has been started */
02114         CFS_FAIL_TIMEOUT(OBD_FAIL_OST_BRW_PAUSE_BULK, cfs_fail_val > 0 ?
02115                          cfs_fail_val : (obd_timeout + 1) / 4);
02116 
02117         /* There must be big cache in current thread to process this request
02118          * if it is NULL then something went wrong and it wasn't allocated,
02119          * report -ENOMEM in that case */
02120         if (tbc == NULL)
02121                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
02122 
02123         body = tsi->tsi_ost_body;
02124         LASSERT(body != NULL);
02125 
02126         ioo = req_capsule_client_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_OBD_IOOBJ);
02127         LASSERT(ioo != NULL); /* must exists after tgt_ost_body_unpack */
02128 
02129         objcount = req_capsule_get_size(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_OBD_IOOBJ,
02130                                         RCL_CLIENT) / sizeof(*ioo);
02131 
02132         for (niocount = i = 0; i < objcount; i++)
02133                 niocount += ioo[i].ioo_bufcnt;
02134 
02135         remote_nb = req_capsule_client_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_NIOBUF_REMOTE);
02136         LASSERT(remote_nb != NULL); /* must exists after tgt_ost_body_unpack */
02137         if (niocount != req_capsule_get_size(&req->rq_pill,
02138                                              &RMF_NIOBUF_REMOTE, RCL_CLIENT) /
02139                         sizeof(*remote_nb))
02140                 RETURN(err_serious(-EPROTO));
02141 
02142         if ((remote_nb[0].rnb_flags & OBD_BRW_MEMALLOC) &&
02143             (exp->exp_connection->c_peer.nid == exp->exp_connection->c_self))
02144                 memory_pressure_set();
02145 
02146         req_capsule_set_size(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_RCS, RCL_SERVER,
02147                              niocount * sizeof(*rcs));
02148         rc = req_capsule_server_pack(&req->rq_pill);
02149         if (rc != 0)
02150                 GOTO(out, rc = err_serious(rc));
02151 
02152         CFS_FAIL_TIMEOUT(OBD_FAIL_OST_BRW_PAUSE_PACK, cfs_fail_val);
02153         rcs = req_capsule_server_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_RCS);
02154 
02155         local_nb = tbc->local;
02156 
02157         rc = tgt_brw_lock(exp->exp_obd->obd_namespace, &tsi->tsi_resid, ioo,
02158                           remote_nb, &lockh, LCK_PW);
02159         if (rc != 0)
02160                 GOTO(out, rc);
02161 
02162         /*
02163          * If getting the lock took more time than
02164          * client was willing to wait, drop it. b=11330
02165          */
02166         if (cfs_time_current_sec() > req->rq_deadline ||
02167             OBD_FAIL_CHECK(OBD_FAIL_OST_DROP_REQ)) {
02168                 no_reply = true;
02169                 CERROR("%s: Dropping timed-out write from %s because locking "
02170                        "object "DOSTID" took %ld seconds (limit was %ld).\n",
02171                        tgt_name(tsi->tsi_tgt), libcfs_id2str(req->rq_peer),
02172                        POSTID(&ioo->ioo_oid),
02173                        cfs_time_current_sec() - req->rq_arrival_time.tv_sec,
02174                        req->rq_deadline - req->rq_arrival_time.tv_sec);
02175                 GOTO(out_lock, rc = -ETIMEDOUT);
02176         }
02177 
02178         /* Because we already sync grant info with client when reconnect,
02179          * grant info will be cleared for resent req, then fed_grant and
02180          * total_grant will not be modified in following preprw_write */
02181         if (lustre_msg_get_flags(req->rq_reqmsg) & (MSG_RESENT | MSG_REPLAY)) {
02182                 DEBUG_REQ(D_CACHE, req, "clear resent/replay req grant info");
02183                 body->oa.o_valid &= ~OBD_MD_FLGRANT;
02184         }
02185 
02186         repbody = req_capsule_server_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_OST_BODY);
02187         if (repbody == NULL)
02188                 GOTO(out_lock, rc = -ENOMEM);
02189         repbody->oa = body->oa;
02190 
02191         npages = PTLRPC_MAX_BRW_PAGES;
02192         rc = obd_preprw(tsi->tsi_env, OBD_BRW_WRITE, exp, &repbody->oa,
02193                         objcount, ioo, remote_nb, &npages, local_nb);
02194         if (rc < 0)
02195                 GOTO(out_lock, rc);
02196 
02197         desc = ptlrpc_prep_bulk_exp(req, npages, ioobj_max_brw_get(ioo),
02198                                     PTLRPC_BULK_GET_SINK | PTLRPC_BULK_BUF_KIOV,
02199                                     OST_BULK_PORTAL,
02200                                     &ptlrpc_bulk_kiov_nopin_ops);
02201         if (desc == NULL)
02202                 GOTO(skip_transfer, rc = -ENOMEM);
02203 
02204         /* NB Having prepped, we must commit... */
02205         for (i = 0; i < npages; i++)
02206                 desc->bd_frag_ops->add_kiov_frag(desc,
02207                                                  local_nb[i].lnb_page,
02208                                                  local_nb[i].lnb_page_offset,
02209                                                  local_nb[i].lnb_len);
02210 
02211         rc = sptlrpc_svc_prep_bulk(req, desc);
02212         if (rc != 0)
02213                 GOTO(skip_transfer, rc);
02214 
02215         rc = target_bulk_io(exp, desc, &lwi);
02216         no_reply = rc != 0;
02217 
02218 skip_transfer:
02219         if (body->oa.o_valid & OBD_MD_FLCKSUM && rc == 0) {
02220                 static int cksum_counter;
02221 
02222                 if (body->oa.o_valid & OBD_MD_FLFLAGS)
02223                         cksum_type = cksum_type_unpack(body->oa.o_flags);
02224 
02225                 repbody->oa.o_valid |= OBD_MD_FLCKSUM | OBD_MD_FLFLAGS;
02226                 repbody->oa.o_flags &= ~OBD_FL_CKSUM_ALL;
02227                 repbody->oa.o_flags |= cksum_type_pack(cksum_type);
02228                 repbody->oa.o_cksum = tgt_checksum_bulk(tsi->tsi_tgt, desc,
02229                                                         OST_WRITE, cksum_type);
02230                 cksum_counter++;
02231 
02232                 if (unlikely(body->oa.o_cksum != repbody->oa.o_cksum)) {
02233                         mmap = (body->oa.o_valid & OBD_MD_FLFLAGS &&
02234                                 body->oa.o_flags & OBD_FL_MMAP);
02235 
02236                         tgt_warn_on_cksum(req, desc, local_nb, npages,
02237                                           body->oa.o_cksum,
02238                                           repbody->oa.o_cksum, mmap);
02239                         cksum_counter = 0;
02240                 } else if ((cksum_counter & (-cksum_counter)) ==
02241                            cksum_counter) {
02242                         CDEBUG(D_INFO, "Checksum %u from %s OK: %x\n",
02243                                cksum_counter, libcfs_id2str(req->rq_peer),
02244                                repbody->oa.o_cksum);
02245                 }
02246         }
02247 
02248         /* Must commit after prep above in all cases */
02249         rc = obd_commitrw(tsi->tsi_env, OBD_BRW_WRITE, exp, &repbody->oa,
02250                           objcount, ioo, remote_nb, npages, local_nb, rc);
02251         if (rc == -ENOTCONN)
02252                 /* quota acquire process has been given up because
02253                  * either the client has been evicted or the client
02254                  * has timed out the request already */
02255                 no_reply = true;
02256 
02257         /*
02258          * Disable sending mtime back to the client. If the client locked the
02259          * whole object, then it has already updated the mtime on its side,
02260          * otherwise it will have to glimpse anyway (see bug 21489, comment 32)
02261          */
02262         repbody->oa.o_valid &= ~(OBD_MD_FLMTIME | OBD_MD_FLATIME);
02263 
02264         if (rc == 0) {
02265                 int nob = 0;
02266 
02267                 /* set per-requested niobuf return codes */
02268                 for (i = j = 0; i < niocount; i++) {
02269                         int len = remote_nb[i].rnb_len;
02270 
02271                         nob += len;
02272                         rcs[i] = 0;
02273                         do {
02274                                 LASSERT(j < npages);
02275                                 if (local_nb[j].lnb_rc < 0)
02276                                         rcs[i] = local_nb[j].lnb_rc;
02277                                 len -= local_nb[j].lnb_len;
02278                                 j++;
02279                         } while (len > 0);
02280                         LASSERT(len == 0);
02281                 }
02282                 LASSERT(j == npages);
02283                 ptlrpc_lprocfs_brw(req, nob);
02284 
02285                 tgt_drop_id(exp, &repbody->oa);
02286         }
02287 out_lock:
02288         tgt_brw_unlock(ioo, remote_nb, &lockh, LCK_PW);
02289         if (desc)
02290                 ptlrpc_free_bulk(desc);
02291 out:
02292         if (no_reply) {
02293                 req->rq_no_reply = 1;
02294                 /* reply out callback would free */
02295                 ptlrpc_req_drop_rs(req);
02296                 LCONSOLE_WARN("%s: Bulk IO write error with %s (at %s), "
02297                               "client will retry: rc %d\n",
02298                               exp->exp_obd->obd_name,
02299                               obd_uuid2str(&exp->exp_client_uuid),
02300                               obd_export_nid2str(exp), rc);
02301         }
02302         memory_pressure_clr();
02303         RETURN(rc);
02304 }
02305 EXPORT_SYMBOL(tgt_brw_write);
02306 
02307 /* Check if request can be reconstructed from saved reply data
02308  * A copy of the reply data is returned in @trd if the pointer is not NULL
02309  */
02310 bool req_can_reconstruct(struct ptlrpc_request *req,
02311                          struct tg_reply_data *trd)
02312 {
02313         struct tg_export_data *ted = &req->rq_export->exp_target_data;
02314         struct lsd_client_data *lcd = ted->ted_lcd;
02315         bool found;
02316 
02317         if (tgt_is_multimodrpcs_client(req->rq_export))
02318                 return tgt_lookup_reply(req, trd);
02319 
02320         mutex_lock(&ted->ted_lcd_lock);
02321         found = req->rq_xid == lcd->lcd_last_xid ||
02322                 req->rq_xid == lcd->lcd_last_close_xid;
02323 
02324         if (found && trd != NULL) {
02325                 if (lustre_msg_get_opc(req->rq_reqmsg) == MDS_CLOSE) {
02326                         trd->trd_reply.lrd_xid = lcd->lcd_last_close_xid;
02327                         trd->trd_reply.lrd_transno =
02328                                                 lcd->lcd_last_close_transno;
02329                         trd->trd_reply.lrd_result = lcd->lcd_last_close_result;
02330                 } else {
02331                         trd->trd_reply.lrd_xid = lcd->lcd_last_xid;
02332                         trd->trd_reply.lrd_transno = lcd->lcd_last_transno;
02333                         trd->trd_reply.lrd_result = lcd->lcd_last_result;
02334                         trd->trd_reply.lrd_data = lcd->lcd_last_data;
02335                         trd->trd_pre_versions[0] = lcd->lcd_pre_versions[0];
02336                         trd->trd_pre_versions[1] = lcd->lcd_pre_versions[1];
02337                         trd->trd_pre_versions[2] = lcd->lcd_pre_versions[2];
02338                         trd->trd_pre_versions[3] = lcd->lcd_pre_versions[3];
02339                 }
02340         }
02341         mutex_unlock(&ted->ted_lcd_lock);
02342 
02343         return found;
02344 }
02345 EXPORT_SYMBOL(req_can_reconstruct);
02346
